Articles.Content:
Hello, since I haven't posted in a while, I figured I would post here... I last played Kerbal Space Program like last February and been taking a break since (waiting for new updates to come out). that was the second time I took a break from this game. first version I played was 0.18, quit when 0.20 came out and returned at 0.23, then quit again.

since It's holidays and .90 was just released, I decided to check things out. and I JUST JIZZED ALL OVER MY PANTS!!!

The game has changed a lot and all these new awesome batch of mods are amazing!, and some old mods are still going strong! I am downloading a ton of them right now and reading up about the new features. My plan is to play stock for a bit then bump it up to modded once I get familiar with all the new things in this game.

anyway.. happy holidays everyone and I'm glad im back here again!

Edited December 20, 2014 by lyndonguitar
Welcome back to the KSP Community
